availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry W. Rouse (Adair County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Adair County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah A. Foster Rouse in Adair County, Kentucky, on July 15, 1849. Father of William Rouse and Nancy E. M. Rouse. Married to Catherine McWhorter Rouse in Hickman County, Kentucky, on September 15, 1857. Father of Mary A. Rouse, Rebecca Jane Rouse, John W. M. Rouse, and Thomas E. Rouse. Farmer in Adair County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Hickman County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, District 2, p. 88B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Adair County, Casey Creek, p 3B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film 004542781.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994039, Hickman County Births, p. 509.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994038, Hickman County Marriages.
